body.name: EUKI Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Chime, Door Bell Ringer Wireless with Camera, 2K HD, Human Detection, Night Vision, 2-Way Audio, IP65
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 31 mins
features: ⚡🔧【100% Wireless & Easy to Install and Set up】This wireless doorbell camera takes less than 5 minutes to install, set up and use. Mount it in your desired location for your apartment, without wires and drills. Download CloudEdge App on Google Play/App Store, only pair the doorbell with your mobile device and wireless chime(batteries included), you can enjoy the convenience of wireless function.

📷🌛【2K HD & IR Night Vision】Thanks to the update from the new version, the resolution of the J7 doorbell camera has been upgraded from 1080P to 2K! It equipment with a wider viewing angle of 166°, offers you crystal-clear images and video recordings, won't miss any out-of-sight corners! Built-in IR lights automatically sense the ambient light and switch to night vision mode, permitting you to see clearly even in darkness.

🔔💬【PIR Human Detection & Two-way Audio】Built-in PIR Sensor allows you to receive instant notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or when motion is detected. Built-in microphone and speaker provide you real-time clear two-way audio, you can see, hear and talk with the visitors immediately, or select a pre-recorded voice message for quick replies.

🎞️🌐【Free Local Storage & Family Sharing】This wireless doorbell is one-time purchased without monthly fee. It will keep more than 24-Month's video with a 16 GB memory card(NOT INCLUDED), and automatically overwrite the previous file to record in a loop. You can also share the account with your family members, it can share up to 5 users.

🌊🔋【IP65 Weather-proof, Low-power & Anti-Theft】Don't worry to mount it outdoor! With IP65 weatherproof(-4℉-122℉), this doorbell camera can withstand the harshest weather conditions. Built-in 5000mAh rechargeable batteries, this low-power doorbell camera lasts longer than other doorbells in standby mode. If someone moves your doorbell, the doorbell's anti-theft alarm trigger will sound a loud alarm to notify your family and neighbors, and your phone will receive an alarm.
body.description: Warm Tips : It only supports 2.4G Wi-FI Connection. The SD card is not included. If notifications are not received, please check whether the notification permission on your mobile phone and the software are turned on. Please tighten the security screw after installing the camera doorbell into the mounting bracket to avoid false anti-Theft Warning. If you have any questions, you can get help online in the App’s Help & Feedback.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: “Privacy is our top priority, protecting our family when we are out and about.” Whether for videos uploaded to the cloud or saved in your SD Card. All date was protected. We deploy bank-level AES 256-bit data encryption codec to secure your personal information while transmitting occurred. Whether you're at work, walking the dog or traveling, you can always see what's happening through your video doorbell.

“A stranger kept knocking on the door, I can see and talk to him via the doorbell.” When you are at home, you can view the stranger before you open the door. When you are not at home, you can chat with visitors in real time through the doorbell. You can also leave up to 10s voice message in the APP. And then you can select a pre-recorded response in a simple way when you're not available to talk or in a hurry.

“Someone stole a package from my front door and I don't want my package be stolen again.” When anyone passes by, the home security doorbell camera will wake up rapidly, and send you app push notifications instantly. Detection Sensitivity and triggering time are adjustable. You’ll only be alerted for the moments that matter. It will also sound an alarm when your doorbell camera is forced removed.

90-Day from 1 Charge Keep recording 90 days after a full charge, 15 events per day and 10s recording length each. The actual duration varies depending on the recording frequency and video length. Secure Cloud Storage and Local Storage Supports up to 128G SD card storage(SD card not included) and provide first 7 days free cloud storage. 166° Wider Angle Viewing Wireless doorbell has a built-in 166° wide-angle lens so that you can get a clearer and wider view at your door. 100% Wireless Chime The wireless chime is easy to be set in any room. It will remind you of the visitors when your phone is not by your side. Never miss an important visitor!

2K IR Night Vision Built-in IR lights automatically sense the ambient light and switch to night vision mode, permitting you to see clearly even in darkness. Anti-Theft Warning If someone tries to remove the doorbell camera, an alarm will be issued and a video alarm message will be sent to your phone. Voice Mail Record audio (up to 10 seconds) in advance so that you can respond with pre-recorded quick reply messages when you are busy. Multi-Device Sharing You can share the local videos with your family members, it can share up to 5 users.

Warm Tips : It only supports 2.4G Wi-FI Connection. The SD card is not included. If notifications are not received, please check whether the notification permission on your mobile phone and the software are turned on. Please tighten the security screw after installing the camera doorbell into the mounting bracket to avoid false anti-Theft Warning. If you have any questions, you can get help online in the App’s Help & Feedback. Package includes: 1* Wireless WiFi Video Doorbell 1* Wireless Indoor Chime & 3* AA Battery 1* Wall Mount Bracket 1* USB Cable 1* User Guide 1* Screw Kit

Why choose EUKI Wireless Video Doorbell Camera? Q1: How long does the battery last? Typically, a full charge lasts 2-3 months, depending on your setup, usage, and temperature. Q2: How much is cloud storage? There is first 7-day Cloud service for free.( 7 days free only for new subscription users of Cloudedge App) We're looking forward to hearing from you with your experience of our cloud service 3 days Cloud Recordings :2.99USD/per month, 30USD/per year 7 days Cloud Recordings :4.99USD/per month, 50USD/per year 30 days Cloud Recordings :15.99USD/per month, 160USD/per year Q3: How to get extra indoor chime and wedge conor? If you need an extra Indoor Chime, you can search for ASIN: B0BJTCY332, and if you need an extra wedge conor, you can search for ASIN: B0BN3Q9DF4. Q4: Can it be use 5GHz Wi-Fi? No, it only support 2.4Ghz WiFi, dual-band (2.4G and 5G) WiFi need to set a separate 2.4G channel. Q5: Is the Wi-Fi connection good? YES. Increased Wi-Fi range, reduced the problem that WiFi is easy to disconnect and the wireless camera can't be used. (The best installation distance is 16 Feet.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good affordable door camera
reviews.reviewText: Update: The camera is still working great and it is very durable. The battery will last for 3 months and with a super charger you will not miss porch pirates or deliveries. Make sure you set it up in the right place on your door ( not too low or too high). It's great for our safety and peace of mind. I recommend this hassle free doorbell camera.The camera was in great shape when I got it. Instillation was easy. The picture is great, it motion detects just fine on a low setting. Its been less than a week since I have put it up. I will get you more of a review once it has passed 30 days and then again in 6 months. Glad I purchased this item as my last doorbell stopped working after 3 years. At this point I would recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. Charged it up while reading instructions , very easy to install on my outside door jamb. Picture and video is very good. It took a few days to get used to the settings and review the pictures. The calendar feature is nice to review on the days you skipped by. Once you need to see a live picture/video it is easy and the pictures are clear. Excellent value over the "big" brand. The remote bell is an easy set up and you can put it anywhere you like is a nice feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Setting up the doorbell was no problem, with the exception of pairing the chime. After several emails to the service team my problem was resolved. Thumbs up to Lavender and the whole service team. I would recommend this doorbell, inexpensive, but effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Euki wireless doorbell
reviews.reviewText: This EUKI Wireless Video Doorbell Camera with Chime is just what I was looking for. It has night vision, two way audio, doorbell. Nowadays with so many packages being stolen right off your front porch a little extra security wouldn’t hurt. Alerts me as soon as someone’s at my porch. Perfect little camera is just what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tried over and over to connect the camera to the app and it never recognized the QR code. It just blinks red and then turns off eventually. I thought I might not be doing it right because I'm not tech savvy, so I waited for my daughter to visit me to help me connect it. After she tried for hours resetting the device, deleting the app, resetting my router, going through the AP network, and trying to reach out to customer service, the camera still didn't work. I gave up, and hope customer service will reach out to me for a solution or new device. I will update my review if they do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this several months ago and it seemed to work well at first. It alerted me pretty immediately if there was movement but the picture quality was never the best but also not the worst. It does keep a fairly long charge, I've only had to charge twice since June and it's now November. Recently, it doesn't alert me when there is movement and there have been several occasions when I've had packages delivered and I never got an alert. The picture quality is now very fuzzy so it's almost like it's deteriorating lol I wouldn't buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed with the camera
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant at first, but now I absolutely love this camera! I've had it since November 2023. I have not had any issues with it. The charge holds very well. It has a good view in the day time and at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Directions don’t mention what is in my review
reviews.reviewText: Very hard to set up app. It kept saying I needed to be connected to WiFi 2 not the 5. I tried several times. Then it said camera was too far away from router. Then it would tell me to change my wpa settings on my router. I couldn’t figure out how to do that. Told me also to power off and restart router. Tried that. Finally I created an account for the app on my desktop and uninstalled then reinstalled the app that I was trying to connect to for the camera. Signed in no problem and when connecting to WiFi it brings up a hidden WiFi (maybe the cameras own?) no clue but I had at connect to that hidden one. I am using my camera more as a security camera than a doorbell. As you can see in pic I place it facing my front door. It also catches a glimpse of my neighbors door. Being as I have a sunporch I didn’t want to face it toward the road as my house is like 40 feet from the road and the motion of the cars would kill the battery very fast. The camera gets placed in a holder than you can slide it out to recharge the battery when needed. It did not come with a micro sim but I had one from my last camera that stopped working after a couple years. Not sure what the SIM card does as every day nothing is saved to it. I did not pay for any service they offer. Maybe I’d I did it would save clips? I just like the fact that I can keep an eye on my front door when I’m not at home and also when it detects motion I get notification. Also sometimes I’ll get to work and wonder if I shut my front door because I go in and out of the house a couple times before driving away. I have left my door open before but thankfully the sunporch I guess distracts intruders. I say this camera is worth the $53 dollars to have a piece of mind. You can easily move it anywhere if needed. It will stand up on a window sill or even a dresser if you have elders or children to keep an eye on. The picture quality is great! Same with the motion detection. Delivered next day too. I do recommend this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent video doorbell at a reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: When I placed the order I received an email, with tips on the installation procedure, which I thought was a nice touch.The doorbell arrived the next day and was well packaged. Setting up an account and installing the doorbell was an absolute doddle, with voice instructions throughout. The setup even gave feedback on the WiFi signal to help choose the best location for the doorbell.The picture quality is excellent, even at night. In fact it is so good I haven't bothered with HD at the moment, just left it at SD.Pairing with the supplied wireless chime was quick and easy, just press the pairing button on the chime and then ring the doorbell.The application works well and has good functionality for live view and alerts. It also makes it easy to share the doorbell with other family members.I can't comment on the battery life yet and will try to update the review once it needs recharging.All in all I'm very happy with my purchase so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We purchased the EUKI smart doorbell and we are very impressed with all the product delivers.It was seamless and easy to install and has 12 month warranty.We now feel secure and have peace of mind that we have that extra piece of security installed in our home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I returned a previous doorbell (different brand) after the 'free lifetime 3 day cloud storage' suddenly wasn't free after 7 months. I chose this one for the price and the fact I can store data to an sd card as I don't want to pay for monthly storage. This works well, in fact if anything it is overly sensitive. I have had to turn the motion sensor to the lowest settings as it sends far too many notifications. I live in a sleepy village so dread to think how it would be in a busy city area. Picture quality is good, I'm sure there's better out there but it does what I require and was a very reasonable price with no hidden extra charges. It also comes with an indoor chime which is a bonus. It's easy to set up and on low settings the battery life seems really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent alternative to the Ring Doorbell. Simply purchase an SD card (mine was £8) and you won’t need to pay for monthly fees. All coverage is stored locally and you can access via the easy to use app. Excellent item and I’m really happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well after contacting the seller directly they helped and even offered a replacement which arrived the next working day !!Had issues with Amazon prior but when it came it’s such an amazing product !!!So Essy to set up and the settings and quality of picture are amazing !!Don’t go anywhere else or if you are wondering hmm not heard of them or can you trust them then just take that risk !!It will honestly save you loads of money with no subscription needed and also more than half price of others from the offset !!Amazing customer service and sleek product and soo ! Thanks so much
